name: Turbo Duel
description:
Turbo Duel is a two player game based on the light cycles seen in the film TRON.
This game has no AI element so there's no 'single player vs computer' option. The player(s) can customise the number of rounds per match, adjust the speed of the game, and toggle both music and the starfield background on/off

shot.caption: The title screen. There's a very long message from the author's which scrolls along the bottom of the screen

Game Over!
There's no high score screenand no option to enter or record who won
